      • typeAngle

        public static java.lang.String typeAngle(Point p1,
                                         Point p2,
                                         Point p3)
        This function find the angle between sections p1p2 and p2p3. For this we are using cosine theorem. After the finding the current type of angle we are using library Math and method acos for searching the degrees of angle
        Parameters:
        p1 - point of class Point
        p2 - point of class Point
        p3 - point of class Point
        Returns:
        Name of angle

        public static double distFromSectionToSection(Section s1,
                                              Section s2)
                                       throws ParallelLinesException
        Try to know whether straights are intersected or no. After this we define the method which we will use for searching the certain distance. If straights bot intersected, then we will finding the distance between the parallel sections

        s2 - section of class Section
        Returns:

      • distFromSectionToStraight

        public static double distFromSectionToStraight(Section section,
                                               Straight straight)
        This function try to know whether the straights are intersected or no. If they are intersected and this intersection point is satisfied the condition for section, then we return 0, else we finding the distance between point and straight. If straights don't intersected, we finding the distance between two parallel straights
        Parameters:
        section - section of class Section
        straight - straight of class Straight
        Returns:
        Certain distance

      • distFromRayToRay

        public static double distFromRayToRay(Ray ray1,
                                      Ray ray2)
        This function try to know whether the straights are intersected or not. If they are and this point of intersection is satisfied the all necessary conditions, we will return 0, else we will find the distance between the point and straight. If the straights are parallel, we will finding the distance between the parallel straights
        Parameters:
        ray1 - ray of class Ray
        ray2 - ray of class Ray
        Returns:
        Certain distance

      • distFromStraightToStraight

        public static double distFromStraightToStraight(Straight straight1,
                                                Straight straight2)
        This function try to know whether the straights are intersected or not. If they are, we will return 0, else we will find the distance between the point and straight. If the straights are parallel, we will finding the distance between the parallel straights
        Parameters:
        straight1 - straight of class Straight
        straight2 - straight of class Straight
        Returns:
        Certain distance

      • intersection

        public static Point intersection(Straight straight1,
